name: ConceptMapR5SignatureElementsForR4Signature
title: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4
description: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

target.comment:
FHIR R5 ComplexType `Signature` is representable via FHIR R4B extensions.
Element `Signature` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Signature`.
Element `Signature.type` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Signature.type`.
Element `Signature.when` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Signature.when`.
Element `Signature.who` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Signature.who`.

Note that the target element context `Signature.who[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Signature`.
Element `Signature.who` is mapped to FHIR STU3 element `Signature.who[x]`.
Note that the target element context `Signature.who[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Signature`.
Element `Signature.onBehalfOf` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Signature.onBehalfOf`.

Note that the target element context `Signature.onBehalfOf[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Signature`.
Element `Signature.onBehalfOf` is mapped to FHIR STU3 element `Signature.onBehalfOf[x]`.
Note that the target element context `Signature.onBehalfOf[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Signature`.
Element `Signature.onBehalfOf` is mapped to FHIR DSTU2 structure `Signature`, but has no target element specified.
Element `Signature.targetFormat` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Signature.targetFormat`.
Element `Signature.targetFormat` is mapped to FHIR STU3 structure `Signature`, but has no target element specified.
Element `Signature.sigFormat` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Signature.sigFormat`.
Element `Signature.sigFormat` is mapped to FHIR STU3 element `Signature.contentType`.
Element `Signature.data` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Signature.data`.
Element `Signature.data` is mapped to FHIR STU3 element `Signature.blob`.
